dropdownlist demo

下拉搜索dropdown 
                <!DOCTYPE HTML>
                <html>
                <head>
                    <meta charset='utf-8'/>
                    <title>dropdownlist demo</title>
                    <script src='avalon.js'></script>
                </head>
                <body>
                    <div class="demo-show" ms-controller="dropdownlist" style="position: relative; z-index: 1;">
                        <fieldset>
                            <legend>下拉搜索dropdown</legend>
                            <div ms-widget="dropdownlist, a, dropdownlist1"></div>
                        </fieldset>
                        <script>
                            require(["dropdownlist/avalon.dropdownlist"], function(avalon) {
                                    avalon.define("dropdownlist", function(vm) {
                                        vm.$skipArray = ["dropdownlist1", "dropdownlist2"]
                                        vm.dropdownlist1 = {
                                            textbox: {
                                                placeholder: "请输入要查找的姓名"
                                            },
                                            data: ["name 1", "name 2", "name 3", "name 4", "name 5", "name 6", "name 7", "name 8", "name 9", "name 10", "name 1_1", "name 1_2", "name 1_3", "name 1_4", "name 1_5", "name 1_6", "name 1_7", "name 1_8", "name 1_9", "name 1_10", "name 2_1", "name 2_2", "name 2_3", "name 2_4", "name 2_5", "name 2_6", "name 2_7", "name 2_8", "name 2_9", "name 2_10", "name 3_1", "name 3_2", "name 3_3", "name 3_4", "name 3_5", "name 3_6", "name 3_7", "name 3_8", "name 3_9", "name 3_10", "name 4_1", "name 4_2", "name 4_3", "name 4_4", "name 4_4", "name 4_5", "name 4_6", "name 4_7", "name 4_8", "name 4_9", "name 4_10", "name 5_1"]
                                        }
                                    })
                                    avalon.scan()
                                }
                            )
                        </script>
                    </div>
                </body>
                </html>
